api_settings.comment: Replace api_key with your actual OpenAlgo API key from the platform

trading_settings.comment: Trading symbol and exchange. Popular choices: RELIANCE, TCS, INFY

grid_configuration.comment: Grid setup: levels = orders above/below center, spacing = % between levels

risk_management.comment: Risk controls: stop_loss and take_profit are % from grid center

execution_settings.comment: Bot execution parameters and logging configuration. initial_position_strategy: 'wait_for_buy' (wait for buy orders) or 'buy_at_market' (buy shares at market price for sell orders)

market_hours.comment: Market trading hours and days (9 AM to 3:30 PM IST weekdays)

advanced_settings.comment: Advanced parameters for fine-tuning bot behavior
